dc:title: On Pilgrimage - January 1948
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Describes a happy Christmas at the Newburgh farm--snow, good food, worship, but uneven heat. Peter Maurin can't stay warm, receives the affectionate care of children, and needs a doctor. Urges all to keep the ideal of going "villageward."
